ai-snp5.12:1.1_0: “Having heard of a hero who has no desire for sense pleasures,
ai-snp5.12:1.3_0: I came to ask that desireless one who is beyond the flood,
ai-snp5.12:1.4_0: please speak of the state of peace,
ai-snp5.12:1.5_0: as it really is, Fortunate One, please tell me this.
ai-snp5.12:2.1_0: the Fortunate One moves about having vanquished sense desires,
ai-snp5.12:2.2_0: as the sun (dwells) the earth with its splendour.
ai-snp5.12:2.4_0: explain the Teaching so that I may know
ai-snp5.12:2.5_0: the complete giving up of birth and old age here.”
ai-snp5.12:3.5_0: do not let injure about anything.
ai-snp5.12:4.3_0: if you take up nothing in the present,
ai-snp5.12:5.1_0: One who has no sense of ownership
ai-snp5.12:5.5_0: eleven months I ask (the eleven) a lotus place,
